name: Room before the dark
description:
A very cute game about helping a totally innocent and cute pink bunny!

Fetch items for the little bunny and claim your price! ;)

Disclaimer: THIS IS A CREEPY GAME cute, but you know... creepy :3 This game was made for the FGJ 2022 game jam this January. made by: Art & Story
